name: Kings of Archery
description:
*************** kings of archery ***************

kings of archery is a classic bow & arrow game that’s packed with stunning 2D realistic graphics, Story mode and exciting power-ups! Practice your shooting skills and go on to be the King.

The game play is really cool and keeps many people happy any time of day. The game objective is simple - Drag, Flick and shoot the target with your arrows.

____Game Modes____
• Story Mode: Try to get more than one star to play in another city. Also, clear top 17 levels in each six city out of total 6 characters.

• Hard Core mode: Try to get best Score. Also, clear top endless levels out of total six city and 6 characters.

____Shooting Tips____
- Pull the bow on the screen.
- Take aim moving to left or right or up or down.
In that time. don't take off your finger on the screen
- Confirm the direction, speed and strength of wind, take aim.
- If you take off your finger on the screen, the arrow will be shot and attack the board.

Challenge your archery shooting skills with this game, show off your high score over Game Center and be the archery's king.

____Game Features:____
o Great bow and arrow mechanics
o Most Realistic 2D physics based game
o 2 Exciting modes (Story & Hard Core)
o Game gets challenging when the board starts moving
o Challenge your friends over Game Center & be the king of archery!
o Amazing graphics and animations and SFX
o Story Mode: Five worlds with 87 Levels and Hard Core Mode: with Five modes and all mode have six characters.
o Optimized iPhone and iPad
